about_the_game:
...No thoughts, just head empty and decorate.

so... what to do?

  • you can customize and freely expand/resize most furniture~
  • change both weather and time to affect the atmosphere of your diorama~
  • most furniture is interactable (and squishable...)~
  • custom furniture (drag and drop sprites into the game...)~
  • invite friends to help you decorate your diorama (this game is not guaranteed to actually ship with friends but i'm working on it.....)~
  • pop bubble wrap~
  • there are no beds.
  • other stuff...? (there are around 1000 decorative pieces or so; despite the obvious decor counter, i’m not actually able to count this high yet so i’m just guessing really….)
  • seriously though, this is just yet another decorating game so all you do is place stuff meaning you should keep your expectations low; but i still hope that you ultimately end up liking diorama since I put a lot of work into it!!~

controls... but what do they do?

WASD / arrow keys - move around your diorama
left mouse button - place furniture anywhere you like
right mouse button - customize most furniture by changing their colour
middle mouse button - copy any selected furniture (surprisingly, this might be the most underused button in most games...)
R - flip/mirror furniture (useful for non-symmetric furniture...)
F - search for furniture by typing names or keywords
E - hide the interface



˚ ༘♡ ⋆｡˚ ❀
